Title: CURRENT_USER
Description:
Returns the user name and host name combination for the MariaDB account
that the server used to authenticate the current client. This account
determines your access privileges. The return value is a string in the
utf8 character set.
The value of CURRENT_USER() can differ from the value of USER(). CURRENT_ROLE() returns the current active role.
Statements using the CURRENT_USER function are not safe for statement-based replication.
